title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17. Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On motif platforms, the Project Properties Info page uses text fields that have automatic borders, making them look like user input targets. Additionally, on Solaris/AIX/HPUX platforms, these fields have different colored backgrounds, which further worsens the appearance.
EB: The Project Properties Info page on motif platforms should not use text fields. Instead, it should use a different UI element that does not have automatic borders and is visually consistent with the rest of the page.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Project Properties Info page on a motif platform.
2. Observe the appearance of the text fields with automatic borders and colored backgrounds.
